queryGroups.name: schemaops
queries: create table samples."samples.dremio.com"."nyc-taxi-trips" STORE AS (type => 'iceberg') AS SELECT ("a","b" FROM (values('a', 'b')) as t("a","b"))

queries.query: select * FROM Samples."samples.dremio.com"."SF weather 2018-2019.csv" where "DATE" between ':start' and ':end'
